name: sabrina-costa-docs
description: Documentação do Dashboard Sabrina Costa com auto-geração de API docs

scripts.docs:deploy: npm run docs:build && echo 'Documentação pronta para deploy'
scripts.install:docs: npm install swagger-jsdoc swagger-cli nodemon husky --save-dev
scripts.setup:docs: npm run install:docs && npm run docs:generate
scripts.changelog:version: npm run changelog && git add CHANGELOG.md
scripts.prepare: if [ -d ../.git ] && [ -x ./node_modules/.bin/husky ]; then (cd .. && ./docs/node_modules/.bin/husky install docs/.husky); elif [ -d .git ] && [ -x ./node_modules/.bin/husky ]; then ./node_modules/.bin/husky install; fi

author: Marco Cardoso <marco@example.com>
